Title: Holiday Twist
Produced by:
Stephanie Garvin 
 Scott  Rosenfelt 
 Chad Oliver
Starring:
Kelly Stables 
 Emily Tosta 
 Caylee Cowan 
 Brian Thomas Smith 
 James Maslow 
 Hugh Sheridan 
 Drew Fuller 
 Neal McDonough 
 Sean Astin
Production: In June 2022, it was reported that Sean Astin, Neal McDonough, and Haley Reinhart would join the cast in supporting roles, and that filming would take place in Los Angeles.
Release: Holiday Twist was released in over 500 theaters in the United States by ETM Distribution on December 1, 2023.
